dataset_id: Nimbus Advanced Vidicon Camera System Visible Imagery L1, HDF5 V001
title: Nimbus Advanced Vidicon Camera System Visible Imagery L1, HDF5 V001
summary: The Nimbus Advanced Vidicon Camera System Visible Imagery L1, HDF5 (NmAVCS1H) data set consists of black-and-white images captured by the Advanced Vidicon Camera Systems onboard the Nimbus 1 (1964) and Nimbus 2 (1966) satellites. Data are provided as HDF5-formatted files. Browse images are also available.
